column1: Baby Barnaby's////If you do happen to find yourself on the wait list
column2: help yourself to some coffee or water on the patio. The coffee is NOT complimentary but it'll keep you warm while you wait for a table. Remember to bring your mug to the table! Once you're seated
column3: one of the sweet waiters will take your order. They have a rather small menu for a breakfast place but I liked that they kept it to what they do best.
